critique: The document expresses concern about juvenile delinquency and youth crime. It aims to address this issue through coordinated government efforts. There's a sense of urgency and determination to improve the situation. It does not express joy. It expresses sadness because of the juvenile delinquency and youth crime. It does not express anger. It expresses fear because of the juvenile delinquency and youth crime. It does not express disgust. It expresses surprise because of the juvenile delinquency and youth crime.
